name: 777 Lucky Slot Casino
description:
Come grab your Welcome Bonus now and start playing these exciting FREE slots today!

Slots - Lucky Slot Casino Wins is an exciting new FREE slots casino experience featuring a great selection of games, Huge Payouts, and exciting Bonuses and ways to Double your Winnings!

Exciting and fast paced game play give you a fun and exciting real Vegas casino experience!

REAL VEGAS STYLE SLOTS EXPERIENCE!
- Spin premium VEGAS SLOTS with 30+ Lines!
- Hit the GRAND Jackpot with PROGRESSIVE Slots!
- Enjoy BIG SYMBOLS, FREE SPINS, ANIMATIONS and MORE with special BONUS games!
- Variety of games including 5 x 3 reels, 5 x 4 reels, and PROGRESSIVE JACKPOTS!
- BONUS and DOUBLE UP games make play fast-paced and ADDICTIVE!
- Play PROGRESSIVE slots with GRAND, MAJOR, MINOR, and MINI JACKPOTS!
- Refreshing game play with unique spins and mini-games! Play and Win while making a big fortune!

WIN EVEN MORE WITH BONUS GAMES!
- Win Coins and Diamonds by Spinning the Magic Bonus Wheel!
- INCREASE your winnings with Bonus Card Matching Game!
- Get even MORE COINS with Pick the Treasure Chest!

DOUBLE UP YOUR WINNINGS!
- Fun game play goes beyond just spinning the reels. Double your winnings on every spin win!
- Win even more with Double Up Roulette game, up to 4X WINNINGS!
- PICK THE CARD and win 2X and 4X WINNINGS!
- Play LONGER with FREE COINS, FREE SPINS, and BONUS WINNINGS!

FUN AND ADDICTIVE THEMES FOR ENDLESS VEGAS STYLE ENTERTAINMENT!
- Search for GOLD with CLEOPATRA in the Egyptian Desert with DREAMS OF THE PHARAOH!
- Go into the Chinese Forbidden City in search of RICHES with RISING TIGER!
- Win more on the LUCKY FARM!
- Grab Mayan GOLD and add even more to your RICHES!
- Play Progressive Jackpots and win more with FORTUNE FRUITS!
- Plus many more exciting themes!
- Amazing Graphics in each theme make game play more enjoyable!

JUMP START YOUR WINNINGS WITH FREE COINS!
- Grab FREE coins with lobby bonus coins every 3 hours!
- Spin and Win with the Bonus Wheel and INCREASE your winnings!
- Win Diamonds you can use to unlock themes!
- Chance to Double Up your winnings to get even MORE COINS!
- Lots of FREE SPINS!

Slots - Lucky Slot Casino Wins will bring excitement, fun and exhilaration beyond your wildest dreams! Join the excitement and start having hours of fun with us!

This game is intended for a mature audience only. It is for entertainment purposes only and does not offer real money gambling or prizes. Playing or winning in this game does not imply future success at real money gambling. This app is not associated with any real casino or gambling websites.
